name: Connection (michs)
description:
This is a 3rd person, point and click, dialogue driven game about meeting new people and forming meaningful relationships. A small act of kindness or a seemingly ordinary encounter can springboard an incredible relationship between two strangers.

music: "A Quiet Thought" by Wayne Jones

Feel free to contact me at liu067@usc.edu. This is my first solo game and I'd love to hear your feedback!
